name: set light settings
set bubbler settings
Navigation Top
Sample Information
Starting point
Ending point
Net Specificity
format:
<template>
  <!-- Conteneur principal dsactiv si sample_gear n'est ni Horizontal Net ni Vertical Net -->
    <v-container
      fluid
      :disabled="isDisabled"
      :style="{
        pointerEvents: isDisabled ? 'none' : 'auto',
        opacity: isDisabled ? 0.5 : 1,
        width: '100%',
      }"
    >

    <v-row class="mt-2">
      <!-- Net Mouth Diameter -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Mouth Opening Diameter"
          v-model.number="sample_net_mouth_diameter"
          :min="0"
          :max="1000"
          :step="1"
          suffix="cm"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_net_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('mouth_diameter')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Net Length -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Length of the Net"
          v-model.number="sample_net_length"
          :min="0"
          :max="1000"
          :step="1"
          suffix="cm"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_net_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('net_length')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Mesh Size -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Net Mesh Size"
          v-model.number="sample_net_mesh_size"
          :min="0"
          :max="1000"
          :step="1"
          suffix="m"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_net_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('mesh_size')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Collector Volume -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Volume of the Collector"
          v-model.number="sample_collected_volume"
          :min="0"
          :max="1000"
          :step="1"
          suffix="mL"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_net_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('collector_volume')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>

    <!-- MID-INFO POPUP -->
    <v-dialog v-model="hintDialog" max-width="500">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title class="text-h6">{{ hintTitle }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>{{ hintText }}</v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="primary" text @click="hintDialog = false">Got it</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ["msg"],
  data() {
    return {
      sample_net_mouth_diameter: "",
      sample_net_length: "",
      sample_net_mesh_size: "",
      sample_collected_volume: "",
      sample_gear: "",
      hintDialog: false,
      hintTitle: "",
      hintText: "",
    };
  },
  computed: {
    isTablet() {
      return this.$vuetify.display.mdAndDown;
    },
    isDisabled() {
      // Dsactiver si sample_gear n'est pas "Horizontal Net" ou "Vertical Net"
      return !["Horizontal Net", "Vertical Net"].includes(this.sample_gear);
    },
  },
  watch: {
    msg: {
      handler(newMsg) {
        const p = newMsg?.payload || {};
        if (p.sample_gear !== undefined) this.sample_gear = p.sample_gear; // <-- rcupre la valeur reue
        if (p.sample_net_mouth_diameter !== undefined)
          this.sample_net_mouth_diameter = Number(p.sample_net_mouth_diameter);
        if (p.sample_net_length !== undefined)
          this.sample_net_length = Number(p.sample_net_length);
        if (p.sample_net_mesh_size !== undefined)
          this.sample_net_mesh_size = Number(p.sample_net_mesh_size);
        if (p.sample_collected_volume !== undefined)
          this.sample_collected_volume = Number(p.sample_collected_volume);
      },
      deep: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    /**
     * Send updates (ensures all values are numbers)
     */
    sendUpdate(topic, extra = {}) {
      this.send({
        topic,
        payload: {
          sample_net_mouth_diameter: Number(this.sample_net_mouth_diameter) || 0,
          sample_net_length: Number(this.sample_net_length) || 0,
          sample_net_mesh_size: Number(this.sample_net_mesh_size) || 0,
          sample_collected_volume: Number(this.sample_collected_volume) || 0,
          ...extra,
        },
      });
    },

    /**
     * Info popup  consistent with previous templates
     */
    openHint(type) {
      if (type === "mouth_diameter") {
        this.hintTitle = "Mouth Opening Diameter";
        this.hintText =
          "Enter the diameter of the nets mouth  the circular opening where water enters the net  measured in centimeters (cm). " +
          "Typical plankton nets range from 2060 cm in diameter. Larger diameters capture more water volume.";
      } else if (type === "net_length") {
        this.hintTitle = "Length of the Net";
        this.hintText =
          "Specify the total length of the net from the mouth opening to the collector. " +
          "Measure in centimeters (cm). This helps calculate the water volume filtered and affects flow resistance.";
      } else if (type === "mesh_size") {
        this.hintTitle = "Net Mesh Size";
        this.hintText =
          "Enter the mesh size of the net in micrometers (m). " +
          "This defines the smallest particles or plankton that can pass through. For example, a 20 m mesh captures microplankton but not bacteria.";
      } else if (type === "collector_volume") {
        this.hintTitle = "Volume of the Collector";
        this.hintText =
          "Specify the amount of sample collected after towing or pumping, measured in milliliters (mL). " +
          "It should correspond to the water filtered and ensures proper concentration calculations.";
      }
      this.hintDialog = true;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .v-text-field input,
  .v-select input {
    font-size: 1.2rem !important;
  }
}
</style>

name: Other Informations
format:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row class="mt-2">
      <!-- Filtered Volume -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Filtered Volume"
          v-model.number="sample_filtered_volume"
          :min="0"
          :max="100000"
          :step="1"
          suffix="L"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :disabled="isDisabled"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_water_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('filtered_volume')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Concentration Factor -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Concentration Factor"
          v-model.number="sample_concentration_factor"
          :min="0"
          :max="100"
          :step="0.01"
          suffix=""
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :disabled="isDisabled"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_water_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('concentration_factor')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Sieve Mesh Size -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Sieve Mesh Size"
          v-model.number="sample_sieve_mesh_size"
          :min="1"
          :max="1000"
          :step="10"
          suffix="m"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :disabled="isDisabled"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_water_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('sieve_mesh_size')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Sample Depth -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Depth of the Sample"
          v-model.number="sample_depth"
          :min="0"
          :max="10935"
          :step="1"
          suffix="m"
          type="number"
          variant="outlined"
          hide-details="auto"
          :disabled="isDisabled"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_water_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('sample_depth')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-text-field>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>

    <!-- Sample Comment (Toujours actif) -->
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-textarea
          label="Sample Comment"
          v-model="sample_comment"
          variant="outlined"
          rows="2"
          :density="isTablet ? 'comfortable' : 'default'"
          @input="sendUpdate('sample_water_params')"
        >
          <template #append>
            <v-icon class="cursor-pointer" @click="openHint('sample_comment')">
              mdi-information
            </v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-textarea>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>

    <!-- MID-INFO POPUP -->
    <v-dialog v-model="hintDialog" max-width="500">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title class="text-h6">{{ hintTitle }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>{{ hintText }}</v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="primary" text @click="hintDialog = false">Got it</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: ["msg"],
  data() {
    return {
      sample_filtered_volume: "",
      sample_concentration_factor: "",
      sample_sieve_mesh_size: "",
      sample_depth: "",
      sample_comment: "",
      sample_gear: "", // <-- ajout
      hintDialog: false,
      hintTitle: "",
      hintText: "",
    };
  },
  computed: {
    isTablet() {
      return this.$vuetify.display.mdAndDown;
    },
    //  Disable fields if Lab culture or Demo / Test
    isDisabled() {
      return ["Lab culture", "Demo / Test"].includes(this.sample_gear);
    },
  },
  watch: {
    msg: {
      handler(newMsg) {
        const p = newMsg?.payload || {};
        if (p.sample_gear !== undefined) this.sample_gear = p.sample_gear;
        if (p.sample_filtered_volume !== undefined)
          this.sample_filtered_volume = Number(p.sample_filtered_volume);
        if (p.sample_concentration_factor !== undefined)
          this.sample_concentration_factor = Number(p.sample_concentration_factor);
        if (p.sample_sieve_mesh_size !== undefined)
          this.sample_sieve_mesh_size = Number(p.sample_sieve_mesh_size);
        if (p.sample_depth !== undefined)
          this.sample_depth = Number(p.sample_depth);
        if (p.sample_comment !== undefined)
          this.sample_comment = String(p.sample_comment);
      },
      deep: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    sendUpdate(topic, extra = {}) {
      this.send({
        topic,
        payload: {
          sample_filtered_volume: Number(this.sample_filtered_volume) || 0,
          sample_concentration_factor: Number(this.sample_concentration_factor) || 0,
          sample_sieve_mesh_size: Number(this.sample_sieve_mesh_size) || 0,
          sample_depth: Number(this.sample_depth) || 0,
          sample_comment: this.sample_comment || "",
          ...extra,
        },
      });
    },

    openHint(type) {
      if (type === "filtered_volume") {
        this.hintTitle = "Filtered Volume";
        this.hintText =
          "Enter the total volume of water that passed through the net or filter during sampling, measured in liters (L).";
      } else if (type === "concentration_factor") {
        this.hintTitle = "Concentration Factor";
        this.hintText =
          "Specify the ratio by which the filtered water volume was concentrated into the final collected sample.";
      } else if (type === "sieve_mesh_size") {
        this.hintTitle = "Sieve Mesh Size";
        this.hintText =
          "Indicate the mesh size of the sieve used to separate particles or organisms, in micrometers (m).";
      } else if (type === "sample_depth") {
        this.hintTitle = "Depth of the Sample";
        this.hintText =
          "Specify the depth (in meters) at which the sample was collected.";
      } else if (type === "sample_comment") {
        this.hintTitle = "Sample Comment";
        this.hintText =
          "Add any notes or context about the sample (e.g., weather, color, debris, issues).";
      }
      this.hintDialog = true;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .v-text-field input,
  .v-textarea textarea {
    font-size: 1.2rem !important;
  }
}
</style>

body
format:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <!-- Step 1: White Balance -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card
          href="calibration_saturation_level"
          class="text-center py-2"
        >
          <v-icon size="64" color="primary">mdi-eyedropper-variant</v-icon>
          <v-card-title class="text-h6">White Balance</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            Use the color picker to measure the current color values and adjust the white balance accordingly.
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Step 2: Lightness -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card
          href="calibration_lightness"
          class="text-center py-2"
        >
          <v-icon size="64" color="primary">mdi-brightness-6</v-icon>
          <v-card-title class="text-h6">Lightness</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            Measure the current lightness value and update the LED intensity or ISO if below optimal levels.
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Step 3: Pixel Size -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card
          href="calibration_pixel_size"
          class="text-center py-2"
        >
          <v-icon size="64" color="primary">mdi-ruler</v-icon>
          <v-card-title class="text-h6">Pixel Size</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            Place markers on the micrometric ruler image to calculate the pixel size in microns per pixel.
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>

      <!-- Step 4: Pump Calibration -->
      <v-col cols="12" md="3">
        <v-card
          href="calibration_pump"
          class="text-center py-2"
        >
          <v-icon size="64" color="primary">mdi-water-pump</v-icon>
          <v-card-title class="text-h6">Pump Calibration</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            Measure the transferred volume and adjust pump steps to improve accuracy in fluid handling.
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
